changelog:
- GUI Version toggle (top-left ⇄ button): Old Version = grid layout, New Version = original size + focus-switching
- Help task completely reworked: standalone mode forces 4x3 grid, scans full monitor for help icons simultaneously (no focus switching), locks other tasks while active
- Help in Scheduler: focus-switch mode at original resolution
- Scheduler now includes all tasks: Gathering, Healing, Bounty, Zombie, Rally, Rewards, Help
- Admin: Template Snapper tool — snap screenshot (F9), draw region, preview crop, name + save PNG (supports subfolders like help/icon)
